Package stincmale.ratmex.meter

Class ParkWaitStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • stincmale.ratmex.meter.ParkWaitStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WaitStrategy

    @ThreadSafe
public final class ParkWaitStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements WaitStrategy
    This implementation of WaitStrategy combines exponential backoff and parking.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParkWaitStrategy

        public ParkWaitStrategy​(java.time.Duration minDelay,
                        java.time.Duration maxDelay)
        Parameters:
        minDelay - The lower desired bound of the blocking time intervals between tests of a condition. Must not be negative.
        maxDelay - The upper desired bound of the blocking time intervals between tests of a condition. There is no guarantee beyond best-effort attempt to not exceed this duration. Must not be negative.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultInstance

        public static final ParkWaitStrategy defaultInstance​()
        Always returns the same instance with:
        • minDelay 50ns;
        • maxDelay 300ns.
        Returns:
        An instance of ParkWaitStrategy.
